data.title: Michael P. Sullivan, Jr.

data.text:
Currently As CEO and Founder, Mike Sullivan leads Peak’s internal operations, builds lasting client partnerships and maintains a strong culture of client service excellence. Known as an innovator and problem solver in the commercial real estate industry, he is sought after both for his company’s design/build capabilities and as a construction manager/consultant. Since 1997 Mike has grown Peak from a small local firm into a national design/build construction and construction management corporation with projects competed in more than 13 states, over 50 employees and annual revenue of $150 Million.

Expertise Mike oversees all aspects of the company’s business and is actively involved in operations and client service issues. Mike delivers hands-on expertise on all his projects, which provides his clients with his unique project approach and exceptional solutions. Well-versed across numerous construction markets including land development, healthcare, hospitality, assisted living, industrial, office, and retail, Mike’s specialties are freezer/cooler facilities, large commercial and industrial construction, and construction management.
